resources.string: <omiEnvelope xmlns=\"http://www.opengroup.org/xsd/omi/1.0/\" version=\"1.0\" ttl=\"0\"><call msgformat=\"odf\"><msg><Objects xmlns=\"http://www.opengroup.org/xsd/odf/1.0/\"><Object><id>ParkingService</id><InfoItem name=\"FindParking\"><value type=\"odf:Objects\"><Objects><Object type=\"FindParkingRequest\"><id>Parameters</id><InfoItem name=\"WantedSpotType\"><value>ElectricVehicle</value></InfoItem><InfoItem name=\"ArrivalTime\"><value type=\"dateTime\">yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sss+-hh:mm</value></InfoItem><Object type=\"schema:GeoCoordinates\"><id>Destination</id><InfoItem name=\"latitude\"><value type=\"xs:double\">%1$d</value></InfoItem><InfoItem name=\"longitude\"><value type=\"xs:double\">%1$d</value></InfoItem></Object></Object></Objects></value></InfoItem></Object></Objects></msg></call></omiEnvelope>
